docs.text: My Project Documentation Table of Contents Introduction Installation Usage Functions process_file count_words extract_images_from_docx License Introduction This project provides a set of utility functions for processing text and DOCX files. It allows users to read text files, extract text from DOCX documents, count words in a given text, and extract images from DOCX files. Installation To use this project, ensure you have Python installed. You can install the necessary dependencies using pip. Create a requirements.txt file and include the following:
